quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of   thinking.
quotes.speaker: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, tihnk of what a precious privlege it is to be alive - to breathe.
quotes.speaker: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Experience is the teacher of all things.
quotes.speaker: Julius Ceasar

quotes.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
quotes.speaker: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quotes.speaker: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.speaker: Nietzsche

quotes.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.speaker: Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The history of the world is none other than the progress of [...] freedom.
quotes.speaker: Hegel

quotes.quote: Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion.
quotes.speaker: Hegel
